name: Cardiology
description: Cardiology is the branch of medicine that deals with the study, diagnosis, and treatment of heart-related diseases and disorders.

name: Dermatology
description: Dermatology is the branch of medicine that focuses on the diagnosis and treatment of skin, hair, and nail conditions.

name: Ophthalmology
description: Ophthalmology is the branch of medicine that deals with the study and treatment of eye diseases and disorders.

name: Orthopedics
description: Orthopedics is the branch of medicine that deals with the musculoskeletal system, including bones, muscles, joints, ligaments, and tendons.

name: Gastroenterology
description: Gastroenterology is the branch of medicine that focuses on the study and treatment of digestive system disorders and diseases.

name: Neurology
description: Neurology is the branch of medicine that deals with the study and treatment of diseases and disorders of the nervous system.

name: Pediatrics
description: Pediatrics is the branch of medicine that focuses on the medical care of infants, children, and adolescents.

name: Obstetrics and Gynecology
description: Obstetrics and Gynecology is the branch of medicine that deals with pregnancy, childbirth, and female reproductive health.

name: Psychiatry
description: Psychiatry is the branch of medicine that deals with the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of mental, emotional, and behavioral disorders.

name: Radiology
description: Radiology is the branch of medicine that uses medical imaging technologies like X-rays, MRI, and CT scans to diagnose and treat diseases.
